Manage Guild: Manage your Guild with less time and effort.
Secure-desc: You can lend your assets safely without handing out your private keys.
Instant-desc: You can distribute your players` earnings in a faster and easier way.
Reliable-desc: You can automatically set daily minimum earnings for players to maximize your profitability
Multiple Games-desc: Manage your assets and earnings across different crypto games.
Performance Monitoring-desc: Monitor and set daily tasks for players to maximize your profitability.
Automated Payouts-desc: Avoid wasting your time by using our automated payout system within a few clicks.
Non-custodial Lending-desc: Lend your assets without handing out your private keys.
